author: jstrachan
msg: Messenger now works against the J2EE SDK. Added Digster for loading JMS connections and sessions from an XML deployment descriptor. Also added a JUnit test case that sends & receives from a JMS topic and queue. Finally begun to create a mini-website and documentation.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added JNDISessionFactory for Messenger that takes its ConnectionFactory from JNDI

author: jstrachan
msg: Removed dependency on Jakarta commons-pool. Now pooling is done via java.lang.ThreadLocal to ensure that the same JMS Session is used by the same calling thread for now. Also added SessionFactory for creating JMS Session objects from a given JMS Connection or JMS ConnectionFactory.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added default implementations based on optional ServerSessionPool and Jakarta Commons Pool implementations

author: jstrachan
msg: First checkin of JMS facade API to make it easier to work with JMS in servlet and taglib environments
